meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of tsars or the tsarist system.
meanings.sent1: The royal family lived in a grand tsarists palace.
meanings.sent2: The historian studied the tsarists traditions of the past.
meanings.sent3: The tsarists decorations in the room made it feel like a royal chamber.
meanings.sent4: Her elegant dress had a tsarists flair that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a masterpiece depicting the tsarists era in vivid colors.

meanings.definition: Supporters or advocates of the tsarist regime.
meanings.sent1: The tsarists gathered in the square to show their loyalty.
meanings.sent2: The tsarists believed in the power of the monarchy.
meanings.sent3: The group of tsarists joked about starting a royal fan club.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the tsarists leader, always defending the old ways.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered for the tsarists, waving flags in support of the regime.
